Interface ServletServiceAdapterComponent

All Superinterfaces:
Component, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardServletServiceAdapterComponent
public interface ServletServiceAdapterComponent
extends Component, java.io.Serializable

A service adapter which by having the servlet's service method, translates a servlet's request into a service call.
